thread.section_title: Intoxalock Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Intoxalock | intoxalock.com | 8 of 218
thread.title: kyle

author: kyle
title: kyle
text: So yea lets face it having intolalock SUCKS. But if you have it its because of your own choices. But so many reviews are terrible. I think the bad reveiws are biased based on situations verses experience. Because the unit itself works perfectly. Follow the rules and your set no funny buisness. All fees were straight forward and the process was simple. Intoxaloc was eager to help and work around my schedule. THUMBS UP TO MANDY WAMBOLD! SHE WAS MY GO TO PERSON! online chat and directly ask for her she is the best. Always had an answer and if she didn't she would find out while I waited. She was polite and stood behind what she said. Thank you Mandy! You made this all so simple!
